import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; //import { Radar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import playersArray from "../../globals/skrallgaming/players" import placings from "../../globals/skrallgaming/placings" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/createThornament.css" export default function CreateThornament(){ const { players, setPlayers } = usePlayers() const [ teams, setTeams ] = useState([]) const [ groupMaxPlayers, setGroupMaxPlayers ] = useState(4) const [ groupStage, setGroupStage ] = useState(true) const [ teamName, setTeamName] = useState() const [ p1, setP1 ] = useState() const [ p2, setP2 ] = useState() const registerTeam = () =>{ console.log(p1, p2, teamName) if (!p1 || !p2) return let arr = [...[], ...teams] arr.push({ name: teamName, players: [p1, p2] }) setTeams(arr); } useState(() => {if (!players?.lenght) setPlayers(playersArray)}, []) return <>
